activities: Through iovation services, the IP address and other device identifying data elements are collected from the end users of our subscribers who connect with our subscribers’ websites which are operated and controlled by such subscribers.  The IP address and other device identifying data elements are then stored in iovation’s database and distributed to other iovation subscribers in order to assist our subscribers in fraud detection and prevention.  Through iovation services, we collect only device specific information from end users of our subscribers.  iovation also collects account identifiers directly from our subscribers.  Information obtained via our website is used for prospecting purposes or to respond to offerings specific to iovation’s services only.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
